channel.title: salad on cPanel's Favorite Recipes
channel.description: Recent content in salad on cPanel's Favorite Recipes

item.title: Chicken Ceasar Salad on a Stick
item.description: This chicken Caesar-on-a-stick appetizer is a fun twist on a classic salad!

item.title: Grilled Chicken Salad Sandwich
item.description: This is a great way to use leftover grilled chicken breasts from dinner the night before. I like it on wheat. My husband likes it on sourdough.

item.title: Perfect Summer Fruit Salad
item.description: The perfect fruit salad for a backyard bbq or any occasion. There are never leftovers! This is one of my favorite fruit salad recipes, as I think the sauce really makes it.
